summary: The test suite validates core components of the NeMo Lightning framework, focusing on the MegatronParallel module’s setup, configuration, callback integration, event handling, and micro‑batch processing, as well as the strategy library’s logic for initializing model‑parallel groups and rank assignments in distributed settings using mock environments.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable parallel training and correct distributed strategy initialization in NeMo Lightning by detecting regressions or misconfigurations through comprehensive unit tests.
